collection:
This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, share, and protect
personal data in compliance with the laws of the CCPA and the GDPR.

We may collect personal information, including but not limited to names,
email addresses, and payment details, during the purchase process.

Non-personal information such as device information, browser type, and IP
addresses may be automatically collected.

We collect personal information for the purpose of processing orders,
providing customer support, and improving our services.

Non-personal information is collected for analytics, security, and
website optimization purposes.

We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance user
experience and collect analytical data.

Instabooks AI does not knowingly collect personal information from
individuals under the age of 16.
